DOC.detailed_description: RESEARCH QUESTION Can 0.5mg/kg Ketamine give preoperatively effect level pro-inflammatory marker ? Primary specific Outcome : changes/deviations baseline level IL- 6 pro-inflammatory marker surgery PACU , 24 48 hour . Secondary specific Outcome : changes/deviations baseline level IL-1β pro-inflammatory marker surgery PACU , 24 48 hour .
DOC.criteria: Consented patient due elective surgery Adult patient 18 70 year old ASA I ASA II score patient , normal patient mild systemic illness Emergency case already high level inflammatory marker secrete system incision time e.g . road traffic accident Patients chronic / severe hypertension Febrile Patients ( T > 38°C ) Persistently raise blood pressure 140/90 2 consistent reading 15 minute apart Patients pheochromocytoma Spinal local infiltration anaesthesia case Neuro surgery patient Ketamine contra indicate Epilepsy patient ASA IIIE Patients receive Aspirin prophylaxis Chronic inflammatory disease state hyperparathyroidism
